entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Muskoka
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:04 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 07:50 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.9°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -8.5°C
Wind: W 28 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow early this morning. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this morning then becoming light early this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
